ai-tika-s0402t54:1_0: The training rule on lying down:
ai-tika-s0402t54:2_1: is the first of a bad person,
ai-tika-s0402t54:2_6: avoids alcoholic drinks that cause negligence,
ai-tika-s0402t54:2_7: kills living creatures, steals, takes hold of them, contacts them, and takes hold of them.
ai-tika-s0402t54:2_9: This is called a person who has been appointed, and one who has been accused, one who is unethical, of bad character. That’s why, one should say such a thing.’
ai-tika-s0402t54:2_11: The experts on what they’ve done, and the chief disciples of a good person: the supreme guide for those who wish to train, the best of men, the highest attainment.
ai-tika-s0402t54:2_12: But when someone had done unethical and responsible for providing for unethical conduct, of bad deeds, and fancy things, making merit with another kind of merit. That way, so long as they remain, a chewed, and separated.’
ai-tika-s0402t54:3_0: The training rule on beautiful ones is finished.
ai-tika-s0402t54:4_0: The correction of a good person is finished.
ai-tika-s0402t54:5_0: Right away, thinking, “Take this much lesser,” is the second section.
